import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" import { toast } from "react-toastify" import { URL } from '../../../config' const Signup = () => { const [firstname, setFirstName] = useState('') const [lastname, setLastName] = useState('') const [gender, setGender] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [phone_no, setPhone] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const navigate = useNavigate() const signupUser = () => { if (firstname.length !== 0) { if (email.length !== 0) { if (password.length !== 0) { const body = { firstname, lastname, gender, email, password, phone_no } const url = `${URL}/users/signup` axios.post(url, body).then((response) => { const result = response.data console.log(result) if(result['status'] === 'success') { toast.success('signup success') navigate('/login') } else{ toast.error(result['error']) } }) } else{ toast.error("Enter Password") } } else{ toast.error('Enter Email') } } else{ toast.error('Enter Firstname') } } return (
{/*
